metadata.description: Action which installs Jira via Helm chart
metadata.name: install

action.args:
{"workflow":{"entrypoint":"jira-install","templates":[{"inputs":{"artifacts":[{"name":"input-parameters"}]},"name":"jira-install","steps":[[{"voltron-action":"postgresql.install","name":"install-db","arguments":{"artifacts":[{"name":"input-parameters","raw":{"data":"superuser:
  username: jira
  password: okon
defaultDBName: jira
"}}]},"voltron-when":"postgresql == nil"}],[{"voltron-action":"jinja2.template","name":"create-helm-args","arguments":{"artifacts":[{"name":"template","raw":{"data":"context:
  name: "jira-helm-release"
  dryRun: false
  timeout: "10m"
  platform:
    namespace: "default"
args:
  command: "install"
  generateName: true
  chart:
    name: "jira-software"
    repo: "https://helm.mox.sh"
  output:{% raw %}
    goTemplate:
      version: "{{ .Values.image.tag }}"
      host: '{{ template "jira-software.fullname" . }}'{% endraw %}
  values:
    postgresql:
      enabled: false
    databaseConnection:
      host: "{{ host }}"
      user: "{{ superuser.username }}"
      password: "{{ superuser.password }}"
      database: "{{ defaultDBName }}"
    ingress:
      enabled: true
      hosts:
      - host: jira-cloud.voltron.local
        paths: ['/']
"}},{"name":"input-parameters","from":"{{workflow.outputs.artifacts.postgresql}}"}]}}],[{"voltron-outputTypeInstances":[{"name":"jira-config","from":"additional"},{"name":"jira-helm-release","from":"helm-release"}],"voltron-action":"helm.run","name":"helm-run","arguments":{"artifacts":[{"name":"input-parameters","from":"{{steps.create-helm-args.outputs.artifacts.render}}"}]}}]]}]}}

metadata.description: Action which installs PostgreSQL database via Helm chart
metadata.name: install

action.args:
{"workflow":{"entrypoint":"postgres-install","templates":[{"inputs":{"artifacts":[{"name":"input-parameters"}]},"name":"postgres-install","steps":[[{"voltron-action":"jinja2.template","name":"create-helm-args","arguments":{"artifacts":[{"name":"input-parameters","from":"{{inputs.artifacts.input-parameters}}"},{"name":"template","raw":{"data":"context:
  name: "helm-runner-example"
  dryRun: false
  timeout: "10m"
  platform:
    namespace: "default"
args:
  command: "install"
  generateName: true
  chart:
    name: "postgresql"
    repo: "https://charts.bitnami.com/bitnami"
  values:
    image:
      pullPolicy: Always
    postgresqlDatabase: {{ defaultDBName }}
    postgresqlUsername: {{ superuser.username }}
    postgresqlPassword: {{ superuser.password }}
  output:{% raw %}
    goTemplate:
      host: '{{ template "common.names.fullname" . }}'
      port: '{{ template "postgresql.port" . }}'
      defaultDBName: '{{ template "postgresql.database" . }}'
      superuser:
        username: '{{ template "postgresql.username" . }}'
        password: '{{ template "postgresql.password" . }}'{% endraw %}
"}}]}}],[{"voltron-outputTypeInstances":[{"name":"postgresql","from":"additional"},{"name":"psql-helm-release","from":"helm-release"}],"voltron-action":"helm.run","name":"helm-run","arguments":{"artifacts":[{"name":"input-parameters","from":"{{steps.create-helm-args.outputs.artifacts.render}}"}]}}]]}]}}

action.args:
{"workflow":{"entrypoint":"postgres-install","templates":[{"inputs":{"artifacts":[{"name":"input-parameters"}]},"name":"postgres-install","steps":[[{"voltron-action":"jinja2.template","name":"create-helm-args","arguments":{"artifacts":[{"name":"input-parameters","from":"{{inputs.artifacts.input-parameters}}"},{"name":"template","raw":{"data":"context:

args:

  output:{% raw %}
    goTemplate:
      host: '{{ template "common.names.fullname" . }}'

      superuser:
        username: '{{ template "postgresql.username" . }}'

"}}]}}],[{"voltron-outputTypeInstances":[{"name":"postgresql","from":"additional"},{"name":"psql-helm-release","from":"helm-release"}],"voltron-action":"helm.run","name":"helm-run","arguments":{"artifacts":[{"name":"input-parameters","from":"{{steps.create-helm-args.outputs.artifacts.render}}"}]}}]]}]}}

metadata.description: Action which installs PostgreSQL database via Helm chart
metadata.name: install

action.args:
{"workflow":{"entrypoint":"postgres-install","templates":[{"inputs":{"artifacts":[{"name":"input-parameters"}]},"name":"postgres-install","steps":[[{"voltron-action":"jinja2.template","name":"create-helm-args","arguments":{"artifacts":[{"name":"input-parameters","from":"{{inputs.artifacts.input-parameters}}"},{"name":"template","raw":{"data":"context:
  name: "helm-runner-example"
  dryRun: false
  timeout: "10m"
  platform:
    namespace: "default"
args:
  command: "install"
  generateName: true
  chart:
    name: "postgresql"
    repo: "https://charts.bitnami.com/bitnami"
  values:
    image:
      pullPolicy: Always
    postgresqlDatabase: {{ defaultDBName }}
    postgresqlUsername: {{ superuser.username }}
    postgresqlPassword: {{ superuser.password }}
  output:{% raw %}
    goTemplate:
      host: '{{ template "common.names.fullname" . }}'
      port: '{{ template "postgresql.port" . }}'
      defaultDBName: '{{ template "postgresql.database" . }}'
      superuser:
        username: '{{ template "postgresql.username" . }}'
        password: '{{ template "postgresql.password" . }}'{% endraw %}
"}}]}}],[{"voltron-outputTypeInstances":[{"name":"postgresql","from":"additional"},{"name":"psql-helm-release","from":"helm-release"}],"voltron-action":"helm.run","name":"helm-run","arguments":{"artifacts":[{"name":"input-parameters","from":"{{steps.create-helm-args.outputs.artifacts.render}}"}]}}]]}]}}

metadata.description: Specifies that a given manifest is related to GCP
metadata.name: gcp

metadata.description: Action which provisions CloudSQL for PostgreSQL database
metadata.displayName: Install PostgreSQL database using CloudSQL instance
metadata.name: install

action.args:
{"workflow":{"entrypoint":"postgres-install","templates":[{"inputs":{"artifacts":[{"name":"input-parameters"}]},"name":"postgres-install","steps":[[{"voltron-action":"jinja2.template","name":"create-cloudsql-args","arguments":{"artifacts":[{"name":"input-parameters","from":"{{inputs.artifacts.input-parameters}}"},{"name":"template","raw":{"data":"context:
  name: "cloudsql-runner-example"
  dryRun: false
  timeout: "10m"
args:
  group: "sql"
  command: "create"
  generateName: true
  instance: # this maps to https://cloud.google.com/sql/docs/mysql/admin-api/rest/v1beta4/instances
    databaseVersion: "POSTGRES_11"
    region: "us-central"
    defaultDBName: {{ defaultDBName }}
    rootPassword: {{ superuser.password }}
    settings:
      tier: "db-g1-small"
      ipConfiguration:
        authorizedNetworks:
          - name: internet
            value: "0.0.0.0/0"
  output:{% raw %}
    goTemplate:
      host: "{{ (index .DBInstance.IpAddresses 0).IpAddress  }}"
      port: "{{ .Port }}"
      defaultDBName: "{{ .DefaultDBName }}"
      superuser:
        username: "{{ .Username }}"
        password: "{{ .Password }}"{% endraw %}
"}}]}}],[{"voltron-outputTypeInstances":[{"name":"postgresql","from":"additional"}],"voltron-action":"cloudsql.run","name":"cloudsql-run","arguments":{"artifacts":[{"name":"input-parameters","from":"{{steps.create-cloudsql-args.outputs.artifacts.render}}"},{"name":"gcp-sa","from":"{{workflow.outputs.artifacts.gcp-sa}}"}]}}]]}]}}

metadata.description: Specifies that a given manifest is related to GCP

args:

        password: "{{ .Password }}"{% endraw %}
"}}]}}],[{"voltron-outputTypeInstances":[{"name":"postgresql","from":"additional"}],"voltron-action":"cloudsql.run","name":"cloudsql-run","arguments":{"artifacts":[{"name":"input-parameters","from":"{{steps.create-cloudsql-args.outputs.artifacts.render}}"},{"name":"gcp-sa","from":"{{workflow.outputs.artifacts.gcp-sa}}"}]}}]]}]}}
